Package org.GameLogic.Communication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Communication
    Interface to structure the requests for the GameHandler.
    CommunicationHandlerCallback
    This interface does structure the responses that are generated by asynchronous events in the GameHandler
    GameRunner
    Interface for a routing function for messages, to enable more specific behavior in certain situations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommunicationHandler  
    EndedGameCycle
    After the game is finished, spectators have the possibility to see the game.
    StandardGameCycle
    This implementation of GameRunner is meant for a typical game that is either not started, paused or in progress.
